Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape

  • public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to represent two-dimensional geometric shapes which can be drawn in a PaintContainer.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setCircle

        public void setCircle(int x,
                      int y,
                      int radius)
        Set a circle definition for this shape
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the circle center
        y - The y coordinate of the circle center
        radius - The radius of the circle

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare(int x,
                      int y,
                      int width)
        Set a square definition for this shape
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top-left corner of the square
        y - The y coordinate of the top-left corner of the square
        width - The width and height of the square

      • setRectangle

        public void setRectangle(int x,
                         int y,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Set a square definition for this shape
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top-left corner of the square
        y - The y coordinate of the top-left corner of the square
        width - The width of the rectangle
        height - The height of the rectangle

      • setQuadrangle

        public void setQuadrangle(int xa,
                          int ya,
                          int xb,
                          int yb,
                          int xc,
                          int yc,
                          int xd,
                          int yd)
        Set a quadrangle definition for this shape
        Parameters:
        xa - ... The x coordinates of the corner points
        ya - ... The y coordinates of the corner points

      • setTriangle

        public void setTriangle(int xa,
                        int ya,
                        int xb,
                        int yb,
                        int xc,
                        int yc)
        Set a triangle definition for this shape
        Parameters:
        xa - ... The x coordinates of the corner points
        ya - ... The y coordinates of the corner points

      • setCompound

        public void setCompound()
        Make this shape a compound shapes. A shape can be added to the composition by adding it to the subShapes vector of this shape.

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(boolean fill,
                          java.awt.Color color)
        Set the drawing properties, like filled or not, and the color for this shape. This only works with primitive shapes!
        Parameters:
        fill - Whether this shape should be filled or not
        color - The color of this shape

      • draw

        public void draw(PaintContainer pc,
                 int xoff,
                 int yoff)
        Draw the shape in the specified paintcontainer, with a specified extra offset from the top-left corner of the paintcontainer.
        Parameters:
        pc - the PaintContainer to draw in
        xoff - the x offset from the top-left corner of pc
        yoff - the y offset from the top-left corner of pc

      • draw

        public void draw(PaintContainer pc)
        Draw the shape in the specified paintcontainer, without an extra offset.
        Parameters:
        pc - the PaintContainer to draw in
